instruction: theorem AP_2 (S : Set ℝ) (f f' : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : ∀ x ∈ S, HasDerivWithinAt f (f' x) S x) (h₂ : ∃ M : ℝ, ∀ x ∈ S, |f' x| ≤ M) : UniformContinuousOn f S := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem AP_2 (S : Set ℝ) (f f' : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : ∀ x ∈ S, HasDerivWithinAt f (f' x) S x) (h₂ : ∃ M : ℝ, ∀ x ∈ S, |f' x| ≤ M) : UniformContinuousOn f S := by sorry
